title: This Mystery Tech is Way TOO Expensive
description: Download Whatnot  and join me there live on Thursday, 11/30, at 3pm PT, for your chance to win a PS5 and more and get some awesome holiday gifting deals!  Hyperkin RetroN 5 on Amazon:  Hammer Fist:  CMF by Nothing 65W GaN Charger on Amazon:  CMF by Nothing Watch Pro on Amazon:  CMF by Nothing Buds Pro on Amazon:  Drop + EPOS PC38X Gaming Headset:  Polaroid I-2 Instant Camera on Amazon:  Gotta Go Flamingo on Amazon:   By using our Amazon affiliate links we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  Subscribe for more!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:  Threads:   Chapter Titles: 0:00 Retron 5 2:06 Hammer Fist 3:38 Whatnot 4:26 CMF by Nothing 9:44 EPOS Gaming Headset 11:58 Polaroid I-2 13:15 CyberBeer 16:28 Gotta Go Flamingo
